taskDescription: Indole reacts with electrophiles at C3 rather than at C2. Draw resonance forms of the intermediate cations resulting from reaction at C2 and C3, and explain the observed results.
detailedSolution: Reaction at C2 is disfavored because the aromaticity of the benzene ring is lost.
